content:
IInputSessionChannel Interface

Definition

Defines the interface that associates an input channel with a session.

In this Article

public interface IInputSessionChannel : System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel, System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel<System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>

Remarks

The IInputSessionChannel interface indicates that an IInputChannel implements IInputSession semantics.

The IInputSession associated with an IInputSessionChannel can be retrieved through the Session property.
